Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Node>

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Node>
    The Node class represents the territories of Risk. Each Node is a territory, containing a number of units belonging to a particular player.
    Author:
    Graham Netherton

    • Constructor Detail

      • Node

        public Node()
        Constructor for the Node class. Initializes the owner to null and the number of units to 0 and creates the adjacency ArrayList.

      • addAdj

        public void addAdj(Node node)

        Parameters:
        node - Node to link to.

      • getThreat

        public int getThreat(int range,
            Player player,
            java.util.ArrayList<Node> checked)
        Generates an integer value representing the threat to this node. The value is based on the relative distance of and number of units within other players' nodes. An individual node's contribution to the threat level is given by (number of units) * (range at node).
        Parameters:
        checked - ArrayList consisting of already-checked nodes.
        player - The calling node's owner.
        range - Integer representing how much further out to check.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the threat to the node.

      • getThreat

        public int getThreat(int range)
        Initial getThreat call that automatically fills out values.
        Parameters:
        range - Integer representing how much further out to check.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the threat to the node.

      • getAdjThreat

        public int getAdjThreat(int range,
               Player player,
               java.util.ArrayList<Node> checked)
        Generates an integer value representing the adjacency threat to this node. The value is based on the the relative distance of nodes not belonging to the node's player. An individual node's contribution to the threat level is based on its range from the original calling node.
        Parameters:
        checked - ArrayList consisting of already-checked nodes.
        player - The calling node's owner.
        range - Integer representing how much further out to check.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the threat to the node.

      • getAdjThreat

        public int getAdjThreat(int range)
        Initial getAdjacencyThreat call that automatically fills out values.
        Parameters:
        range - Integer representing how much further out to check.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the threat to the node.
